ISSUE.TITLE: [Kanban] Record added to `uncategorised` gets placed in first labeled stack
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Please confirm if bug report does NOT exists already ? - [X] I confirm there is no existing issue for this ### Steps to reproduce ? - Film table, open kanban view - Add a record to `uncategorized` [title, language id] - New records get placed in the `G` category ### Desired Behavior New record gets placed in un-categorized section ### Project Details `in development` ### Attachements _No response_
